sub_title: Data Center Facilities Technician bij Google
summary:
I would describe myself as an ambitious technician with a wide range of technical and organisational knowledge. Since September 2015 working in the Google Eemshaven Datacenter. The site has expanded rapidly since then. I have been doing commissioning on several systems during the construction. I joined the operational team after the completion of the first building and spend most of my time working with back up power systems and the associated electrical distribution. I managed and coordinated several projects onsite. Since +2 years leading a team of technicians working in Shift Operations and Data Center floors. 

Pre-Google work experience:
Started working a Friesland Campina right after my graduation as Maritime Officer. I monitored, repaired and let maintenance activities on various systems such as; steam boilers, steam turbines, gas turbines and cooling systems. 

Education: 
- 2013: completed a Bachelor of Maritime Operations. 
- 2020: completed a Bachelor of Business Administrations.

Experience with: 
- Leading a team
- Process management
- Troubleshooting and repair. 
- Control room operations.
- Managing / coordinating projects.
- Commissioning. 
- Vendor relationships
- Generators, power distribution, HVAC
- Steam boilers, gas turbines, steam turbines

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

education.field_of_study: Business administration / Bedrijfskunde / Business management / Bedrijfsmanagement

profile_positions.description:
Role: Team Lead

As a Data Center Facilities Technician you are part of a big international team that designs and operates some of the most sophisticated electrical engineering, mechanical engineering and HVAC systems in the world.

Facilities Technicians at Google data centers operate, monitor and support physical facilities conditions. Some of these duties will include heating and cooling of air and water, power supply, generators, UPS systems, electrical distribution and control and monitoring systems. You regularly inspect, maintain and repair various data center systems such as piping and non-critical electrical or mechanical system components).

As a master of of best-in-class practices, you develop creative approaches to reducing operational costs while improving overall data center efficiency. You ensure that environmental and safety standards are consistently met, identifying problems and making repairs quickly In emergency situations or abnormal conditions, you manage data center performance issues and outages to minimize the recovery time from failures.
profile_positions.title: Data Center Facilities Technician - Level 4/4

profile_positions.description:
I started working at USG Engineering after I completed my education at the 'Maritime Institute Willem Barentsz'. USG Engineering is a leading company in the posting of technical skilled workers. My first project is at ‘Friesland Campina’. 

As engineer at ‘Friesland Campina’ I am responsible for the continuity and quality of multiple energy flows, such as: electrical power, steam, compressed air and cooling water. We work in a shift with a one-man watch system. There are one or more engineers in the day shift. At least one is on watch and the others are busy with maintenance, issuing work permits and projects in the plant.
profile_positions.title: Engineer

profile_positions.description: As part of my education at the Maritime Institute 'Willem Barentsz' in the Netherlands I had to do a six month trainee ship on a seagoing vessel. The goal of this second and last trainee ship is the abilitity to work as an independent mate or engineer.
profile_positions.title: Cadet Maritime Officer

profile_positions.description: Member of the service staff in a restaurant.
profile_positions.title: LOODS Lounge restaurant

profile_positions.description: I had to da a 6 month trainee ship as part of my education at the Maritime Institute 'Willem Barentsz' in the Netherlands. During this internship I learned how to apply my theoretical knowledge into practice. I became acquainted with: working in a team, international colleagues, shifts and time pressure
profile_positions.title: Cadet Maritime Officer
